Core.Line: I don't really want to come, but my family hates to hear this. So I come.
This certificate is heavier than I expected. Perhaps I put too many memories into this piece of paper.
But I can't help being sentimental. That said, I've learned my lesson of being sentimental. I almost failed my calculus course third times because I could not focus my mind.
Sometimes, you need to fight alone. Friends can be in your shoes, but cannot be you.
I don't know what to do after graduation.
But at the moment, I do have something I want to do: escape this ceremony.
<Ending>Ending A: The sky is the limit</>
